Name: organize desks

Round table to be removed from CLT B 13

    Joules' desk to be moved from CLD D 12 to CLD D 8

Name: select conferencing setup
Notes:
The options I've found are:

1. Logitech Rally Plus
price: 2170 CHF
link: https://www.digitec.ch/en/s1/product/logitech-rally-plus-conference-devices-10134067
advantages: the camera can be fixed with a Kensington lock but not all parts can.
disadvantages: cannot be easily moved from the room. Are we afraid of thefts?
Note: aditional mounting kit allows to fix all parts to the tables/walls/stands: https://www.logitech.com/en-ch/products/video-conferencing/accessories/mounting-kit-for-rally.939-001644.html

2. Logitech Rally bar + 1 x mic pod
price: 2700 CHF (bar) + 250 CHF (pod)
link for the bar: https://www.digitec.ch/en/s1/product/logitech-rally-bar-conference-devices-14968391
link for the pod: https://www.digitec.ch/en/s1/product/logitech-rally-mic-pod-conference-device-accessories-10160433
advantages: all-in-one piece of equipment with less cabels compared to the rally plus, easy setup
disadvantages: expensive, similar capabilities to the rally plus in compact packaging (is it worth it?)

3. Owl Pro, the same as we rent + expansion mic
price: ~1550 CHF
link for owl: https://www.digitec.ch/en/s1/product/owl-meeting-owl-pro-conference-devices-13571234
link for the mic: https://www.digitec.ch/en/s1/product/owl-expansion-mic-conference-device-accessories-21425325
advantages: mobile, can be extended with a mic for better remote speaker experience
disadvantages: not amazing sound quality for the in-person participants

Name: spill kit
Notes:
Content:
    PPE, including goggles and masks.
    Absorbing material, mats, paper towels.
    Disinfectant.
    Signs, marker band (sign for no cleaning in the lab which we share with facility services).
    Bags, waste bins, sharps container, forceps etc.
    Signs, labelling, forms.
    Make it in the solid waste container box from ETH waste services.
    Autoclaveable bag.
    Gloves for chemicals in case of a chemical spill.

3D printer procurement
Notes:
Hi Liz, after a discussion with Joel, I believe it does not make sense to go for the cheap 3D printer. His advice was to get a From Labs printer, which is expensive but fairly plug-and-play.

Here's the quote: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DWcw2HMrz8ZCx8S4YLEusXP8nZbEth3j/view?usp=drive_link

It is for the printer, curing and cleaning station, 3 different resins, and 3-years warranty for everything. It sums up to 7200 CHF.
